mechanics.condition: Target is object, weighs 10 pounds or less, and longest dimension is 6 feet or less
mechanics.outcome: Target object receives an invisible mark on its surface; Object's name is invisibly inscribed on the sapphire material component

mechanics.condition: Each time this spell is cast
mechanics.outcome: A different sapphire material component is consumed

mechanics.trigger: On using an Action (speak item's name and crush sapphire)
mechanics.condition: No other creature is holding or carrying the marked item
mechanics.outcome: The marked item instantly appears in your hand, regardless of physical or planar distances; The spell ends

mechanics.trigger: On using an Action (speak item's name and crush sapphire)
mechanics.condition: Another creature is holding or carrying the marked item
mechanics.outcome: The marked item does NOT transport to your hand; You learn the identity of the creature possessing the object; You learn the rough location of that creature at that moment

mechanics.trigger: Dispel Magic or similar effect successfully applied
mechanics.condition: Target of Dispel Magic is the sapphire

description_text: You touch an object weighing 10 pounds or less whose longest dimension is 6 feet or less. The spell leaves an invisible mark on its surface and invisibly inscribes the name of the item on the sapphire you use as the material component. Each time you cast this spell, you must use a different sapphire.At any time thereafter, you can use your action to speak the item's name and crush the sapphire. The item instantly appears in your hand regardless of physical or planar distances, and the spell ends.If another creature is holding or carrying the item, crushing the sapphire doesn't transport the item to you, but instead you learn who the creature possessing the object is and roughly where that creature is located at that moment.Dispel magic or a similar effect successfully applied to the sapphire ends this spell's effect.
